fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- (First) Attack a player, If another Killing role visits them, Your attack will be Unstoppable and bypass any defensive abilities.
- (Second) Guard a player, Giving them basic defense, If another Protective role visits them, The target gets Overprotective defense and their action cant fail by any means.
- (Third) Investigate (35) a player, If an Investigative role visits them, You will learn your target's exact role, ignoring any adverse effects.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can use only the ability corresponding to your position, You will start at a random position and it will shuffle each night(1st -> 2nd -> 3rd -> 1st...)
- You will not be notified if your abilities got boosted, except for investigation results.
